title: Academic Set 6 — Energy Mix & Ageing Societies
description: Pie charts of national energy sources and an essay on the challenges of an ageing population.

task1.title: National energy mix
task1.prompt: The pie charts show the percentage of electricity generated from five energy sources (coal, natural gas, nuclear, hydroelectric and renewables) in Country A in 1995 and 2015. Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.
hints: Identify which sources dominated in each year.
Explain the most notable increases and decreases between 1995 and 2015.
Group smaller categories together when appropriate to avoid long lists.

task2.title: Problem/solution essay — Ageing population
task2.prompt: In many countries the proportion of older people is steadily increasing. What problems does this cause for individuals and society? Suggest some possible solutions.
outline: Introduction: describe the trend and preview problems/solutions.
Body paragraph 1: problems arising from an ageing population.
Body paragraph 2: practical solutions governments and families can take.
Conclusion: summarise key ideas and emphasise a proactive approach.
